review_text:
I recently completed the "Build a Portfolio Website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript" project on Coursera, and it was a fantastic experience! This course provided a thorough introduction to front-end development, helping me build a professional portfolio website from the ground up.

Pros:

Hands-on Learning: Practical exercises that reinforced theoretical concepts.
Comprehensive Content: Detailed modules covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Clear Instructions: Easy-to-follow guidelines that made complex topics accessible.
Professional Outcome: End result was a fully functional, responsive website.
Cons:

Pace: Some sections felt a bit rushed for beginners.
Support: Limited direct support; relied heavily on peer forums.
Overall, I highly recommend this course to anyone looking to enhance their web development skills. It’s a great way to build a tangible project for your portfolio!
